name: grobots-monorepo
description: Grobots Commerce Platform - Medusa Backend + Next.js Storefront

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,STOREFRONT" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix grobots" "npm run dev --prefix grobots-storefront"
scripts.build: concurrently --names "BACKEND,STOREFRONT" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run build --prefix grobots" "npm run build --prefix grobots-storefront"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,STOREFRONT" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run start --prefix grobots" "npm run start --prefix grobots-storefront"
